title: my weekly plan
items: Here is a weekly meal plan for a budget of ‚Çπ1000, with vegetarian preferences:
* Breakfast: Oatmeal with banana and honey (‚Çπ40)
* Lunch: Dal and Rice with Vegetables (‚Çπ120)
* Breakfast: Whole Wheat Toast with Avocado and Tomato (‚Çπ50)
* Dinner: Mixed Vegetable Curry with Rice (‚Çπ100)
+ 1 cup mixed vegetables (bell peppers, onions, tomatoes)
* Breakfast: Poha with Peanuts and Jaggery (‚Çπ30)
+ 1 cup mixed grilled vegetables (zucchini, bell peppers, onions)
* Breakfast: Dalia with Vegetables and Nuts (‚Çπ50)
* Breakfast: Whole Wheat Paratha with Vegetables (‚Çπ40)

This meal plan provides a balanced and nutritious diet, with a variety of vegetarian options. The cost has been kept under ‚Çπ1000, with some flexibility to adjust the quantities or ingredients based on personal preferences.
